effect.shortEffect: Raises Attack two stages upon having any stat lowered.
effect.full: When any of this Pokémon's stats are lowered, its Attack rises by two stages. If multiple stats are lowered at once, this ability takes effect with each stat lowered.

description.black-white: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.
description.black-2-white-2: When its stats are lowered its Attack increases.
description.x-y: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat when its stats are lowered.
description.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat when its stats are lowered.
description.sun-moon: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.
description.sword-shield: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat sharply when its stats are lowered.
